td.content: s:patient complains of moderate pain radiating from the back to the buttocks x 9 days. patient is a 28 YO f. o:Height 68 in, Weight 103 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 16, Heart = RRR, normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to rheumatology.

s:a white F aged 28 ys presents with moderate pain radiating from the back to the buttocks, moderate low back pain. patient also reports of moderate stiffness. she does not smoke she is a heavy drinker o:Height 69 in, Weight 106 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 116, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 18, Neuro = CN 2-12 intact, motor: 5/5 strength throughout, sensation: intact a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered lumbar XRY.

td.content: s:white f correctional officer aged 29 years presents with severe pain and blurred vision in right eye. patient also reports moderate reduced peripheral vision, moderate seeing halos around lights. o:Height 68 in, Weight 105 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17, Skin = needle marks on right elbow a:Glaucoma p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed brimonidine 0.2% - 1 drp apply to affected eye daily, and ordered Intraoccular Pressure.

td.content: s:a 29 YO f correctional officer presents w/ c/o 10 days h/o severe pain and blurred vision in right eye, moderate reduced peripheral vision and moderate seeing halos around lights. she drinks alcohol heavily for the past 2 years Patient does not smoke o:Height 68 in, Weight 104 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17, Skin = needle marks on right elbow a:Glaucoma p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed brimonidine 0.2% - 1 drp apply to affected eye daily, and ordered Intraoccular Pressure.

s:a female aged 30 yrs presents with 8 days history of severe leg pain. patient also reports fatigue, severe rib tenderness, Body Aches. she denies ever using cigarettes pt has a history of excessive levels of alcohol consumption o:Height 68 in, Weight 103 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16, MRI Spine shows a very large complex disc herniation in the right L4-5 region, Back = low lumbar spinal tenderness, paraspinous muscle spasm on the right, decrease ROM in all direction a:Low Back Pain p:administered CELESTONE - 3 MG/ML IM once in 4 month, performed MRI Spine, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
